extension.description: The main Eire (Irish for the rest of us) RTE TV channels released to TVaddons only. Some of the channels in this addon may require a 2mbis - 16mbis or higher connection as they are high speed streams in their country of origin and may buffer from time to time or just not play if you have slower internet speeds. My thanks for Shani_08 for his magic code for f4m streams that inspired this plugin and to thatguy7669 and JohnnyParanoia for the direct f4m links that drives this addon.
extension.disclaimer: This live TV content can change at anytime, we do not run the content server(s) for this addon
